title: Check out this beautiful One Bed Apartment in Streeterville!
posting_body: Schedule a tour today!This building offers a truly unique lifestyle.
Find your home in luxury loft apartment steps from Lake Michigan and River North in Chicago's Streeterville neighborhood.
Step outside your loft and into a world of convenience.

You can enjoy sunbathing on the 10,000 square foot Skydeck, working out in our state-of-the-art athletic room, a round of pool in the gaming room, watching a movie in the private screening room and having cocktails with friends in the waterfront resident lounge.
The Chicago Riverwalk, Navy Pier, Lakefront Path and the Magnificent Mile are all at your fingertips!
Life has never felt so easy at this amazing place at River East.
Contact us to set up a showing!
